website_summaries.verdict: A stylish take on the Propet line of comfort. Some don't find them as supportive or durable as other designs from the brand.
pros: Cute and give foot coverage and support while showing off cute pedicures
Full grain leather upper with open toe
Lace-up closure with hook-and-loop closure at heel
Comes in black, brown, grey and tan
Lightly cushioned tongue and ankle strap
cons: Shoes are not as durable as other styles

customer_reviews.title: Horrible color!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shoe! Because I have lymphedema my feet swell terribly and I have a difficult time trying to get shoes I can wear. This is the first time and they will work with support stocking as well. Very adjustable. My one negative is that I ordered brown thinking they would go with most any color slacks, WRONG! The color is a horrible washed out lookin dark tan. Makes the leather look fake!! I thought I had gotten the tan by mistake when I opened the box. Was going to return to get BROWN but when I looked at my order form they did send this horrible color they call brown. Very frustrating!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis A. Matheson

customer_reviews.title: The sandals were super comfy and I was really enjoying wearing them but ...
customer_reviews.text: The sandals were super comfy and I was really enjoying wearing them but it didn’t take long for them to fall apart. First the stitching around some of the cut-outs came out. Then the sole just split! I only had them for 4.5 months so I wrote to Propet and included a photo. Never heard back, I wrote again and still no reply. There are much better brands out there in this price category, so not buying Propet again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The top is stitched along one side. I have a high instep, so I had a gap where it wasn't stitch. This doesn't allow for any adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: VickySM

customer_reviews.title: Sandal needs repair "out of the box"
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro strip connecting the insole to the shoe bed wasn't glued onto the insole, so it is useless, causing the insole to slip out. I've tried E6000 glue and several other glues, but they don't hold . Will have to take sandal to shoe repair shop. The left shoe is perfect. I would give these sandals 5 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Mamajean

customer_reviews.title: Fully Adjustable and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are comfortable and fully adjustable. The single lace is threaded through the loops of the sandal making it easy to adjust. The shoe can be opened wide enough to gain at least another size in width or pulled tight enough to fit as expected. The heel strap can also be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki B.

customer_reviews.title: Ask for proper size of laces.
customer_reviews.text: Great show, fit was fine, but the laces must have been boot laces. They were 42 Inches long! Despite double tieing I still tripped on the ends. I had to replace them with laces left from an old pair of Propet Ghillies or I'd mention what size. But, I tell you what, putting in new laces in these puppies is a chore!
customer_reviews.author: Ann T. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Well made and soft leather uppers
customer_reviews.text: These are well made , sturdy and the leather is soft. They could be a bit wider; I have a bunion on left foot and I had to work my foot in. Saving grace is that they are soft leather and will stretch. I had surgery on right foot five mos ago for a bunion and hammertoe so right foot id still recovering;however, these are comfortable enough to transition from my Saucony sneakers (only thing I can walk in right now). I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have bought Propet shoes for years until now. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Propet shoes for years until now. I have a very wide foot and high instep. They do not make my width anymore! The only shoe for my width now is Grandma shoes. I may be over 60 but I am fashionable. These shoes have a tongue on them and doesn't come off. Needless to say, I had to cut this off so they would fit. Very dissappointed about Propet's sizing now, will have to pay over 100.00 for my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes...the sandal I was looking for. Perfect fit just like the other four pair (different style) I have from this company. Consistent manufacturing since I purchased the other ones before I retired 8 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: I am in LOVE with these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with these sandals!!!!!! They are comfortable right out of the box. I have flat feet, pronating ankles and osteoarthritis. I can't wait to order other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Super Registered Nurse

customer_reviews.title: ... and found that some of my sandals really weren't comfortable due to continued swelling of my ankle
customer_reviews.text: I broke my ankle last summer and found that some of my sandals really weren't comfortable due to continued swelling of my ankle. These fit very comfortably; I just bought a black pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer KB

customer_reviews.title: They may not be beautiful but I think they are cute and are super ...
customer_reviews.text: They may not be beautiful but I think they are cute and are super comfortable which I seldom say about any shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Beagle Girl

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these at all
customer_reviews.text: I don't like them at all. They are cheap looking and feeling. The insole isn't attached to the shoes. I think they just tried to take cheap shoes and put Prope shoe liners in them. I have other shoes with Prope Ghilly Walker that are so comfortable that I wore them to work. These are NOT comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Cool Styling!
customer_reviews.text: Leather like butter! Wonderful construction and styling that allows full adjustability to tighten with the laces. The arch support wasn't enough for my flat feet so I bought inserts at the drug store and I have perfection! I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: A. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Replace the laces and you'll have a great shoe
customer_reviews.text: The laces are the the worst combo of slippery and stiff and refuse to stay tied, even with double knotting the bow. But once I replaced them, these shoes have become my summer outdoor favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but a bit too narrow for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Good looking but even the wide was too narrow for me. Did return .
customer_reviews.author: geraldine duffy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sandal. I can wear it in a business environment and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe, finally a nice looking shoe for us "more mature" woman who need orthodic support and feels so comfortable also. Please design more of these good looking shoes for us!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel Sarantos

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these, fit first time on! Comfortable and adjusts to my foot, love them!! Got many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Color off.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted red! These were a weird shade of orange or milky coral. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately Not As Expected
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty, well-made shoes and ALMOST fit as expected -- the food bed was uncomfortable, and the toe box was a bit too small Sadly, I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherGalTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love these Sandles!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Sandles,!! Very comfortable, I'd have to say they are a very close comfort to Rockport, which I only wore prior to having to wear orthopedic shoes. So far support is great, too soon to see if they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: love the shoel but one shoe is smaller than the ...
customer_reviews.text: love the shoel but one shoe is smaller than the other all though both have the same size on them one does not fit correctly and hurts my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Just right height!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wear a shoe that it too flat, but this shoe has the needed height without being too high. It is also very stylish and comfortable...the laces add a funky touch!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Bostic

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable lacing makes it possible to fit my foot more closely than most sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Fit well.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well, but IMO, they make my foot look big. I will keep since they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not too good
customer_reviews.text: Not too good, the quality is general, not very good- looking, a little inappropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe great price!
customer_reviews.text: Loved propet gillie in the original style. This one fits and is as attractive as the original. The price was wonderful!GreT shoe great price!
customer_reviews.author: Malicat

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe but about an inch too long and loose in the heel strap. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Spring, Summer and Fall
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! very comfortable, adjustable and very good quality. Run a little wide.
customer_reviews.author: cgomez

customer_reviews.title: Love my Propets-all of them!
customer_reviews.text: This moccasin is amazingly comfortable, right from the first wearing. I've only had them one year, but expect many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K Peasley-Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes they are comfortable and i like the new design
customer_reviews.author: Curly

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sandal
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is as expected. Good for casual and also dressy enough for dress.
customer_reviews.author: jdiggs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little short. Need to order1/2 size larger than normal size
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Andrus

customer_reviews.title: A Good Fit But Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: Propet products are the only shoes I buy. This shoe is also comfortable once you slip your foot in. The only downside is that the top of the shoe where the laces are, feels a tad tighter. I still haven't worn these shoes long enough to give an accurate review. In terms of looks, the shoe is probably best worn with pants. They look a little severe with dresses. Still, these shoes are a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this shoes immensely. There are issues throughout and I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: womandwithdogs

product_meta.title: Propét Women's Ghilliewalker Platform Dress Sandal
product_meta.description:
Comfort footbed sandal with supple, full-grain leather upper is the perfect sandal for walking and support. adjustable hook and loop strap at heel and ghillie lacing for adjustability and style. removable footbed for use with orthotics.

Propet is a rapidly growing shoe company dedicated to making the worlds best walking shoes. Propet shoes are better walking shoes because they're designed and manufactured to be your most comfortable walking experience ever. Extra attention is paid to giving your foot support where it is needed, more cushy comfort where it counts and more room where your foot's moving parts need freedom when walking. The result has to be tried to be believed! Shouldn't you be wearing the world's best walking shoes?
